description: Luffy inflates his arm using Gear Third and hardens it with Armament Haki (Busoshoku Haki), creating a massive black fist that delivers devastating impact. The technique combines the enlargement of Gear Third with the hardening and power boost of Haki.

firstUse.context: Used to defeat the Kraken with a single blow

keyFeatures: Combines Gear Third enlargement with Armament Haki hardening
Creates a massive black hardened fist
Delivers devastating impact capable of knocking out giant creatures
Can be used underwater despite Devil Fruit user weakness

reveals.information: Luffy's first named technique combining Gear Third with Armament Haki

description: An underwater variant of Sky Walk that allows Sanji to move freely in water by kicking off the water itself. This technique enables combat mobility underwater without needing to surface.

firstUse.context: Used to move underwater during the Kraken battle

keyFeatures: Allows movement underwater similar to Sky Walk in air
Provides combat mobility in aquatic environments
Developed during Sanji's two-year training
Can be used while in a coating bubble

reveals.information: Sanji can now move freely underwater using Blue Walk

name.japanese: 悪魔風脚 ビアン・キュイ

description: An enhanced version of Diable Jambe with intensified flames and greater heat output. The name 'Bien Cuit' means 'Well Cooked' in French, indicating the increased temperature compared to the original Diable Jambe.

firstUse.context: Used to burn the Kraken's tentacle

keyFeatures: Enhanced version of Diable Jambe with greater heat
Increased flame intensity compared to pre-timeskip
French culinary terminology reflecting Sanji's style
Can be used underwater

reveals.information: Sanji's Diable Jambe has been enhanced with greater heat output

name.english: Three Sword Style Secret Technique: Six Paths Crossroads
name.japanese: 三刀流奥義 六道の辻

description: A powerful Three Sword Style secret technique that delivers devastating cutting power. The attack can sever massive targets like the Kraken's tentacles with precision and overwhelming force.

firstUse.context: Used to cut the Kraken's tentacle

keyFeatures: Classified as a secret technique (Ōgi) of Three Sword Style
Delivers devastating cutting power
Can sever massive targets
Developed during training with Mihawk

reveals.information: Zoro learned new ultimate Three Sword Style techniques during his training

description: A form of Haki that allows the user to create an invisible armor around themselves, which can be manifested visually as a black, shiny hardening effect. It increases both offensive and defensive capabilities and allows the user to strike Devil Fruit users and Logia types.

firstUse.context: First visual demonstration in the anime, used with Gear Third against the Kraken
firstUse.outcome: Significantly enhanced the power of Gomu Gomu no Elephant Gun

keyFeatures: Creates invisible armor that can be visibly manifested as black hardening
Increases attack power and defense
Allows striking of Logia users and other Devil Fruit users
Can be applied to body parts or weapons
First visual demonstration of hardening in the anime

reveals.information: First visual demonstration of Armament Haki hardening in the anime
